column1: * 1939 - Voice actor Gordon Reid is born.
* 1970 – The Mythcon 1 is held at wikipedia:Harvey Mudd Collegein wikipedia:Claremont
* 1973 - A requiem Mass for J.R.R. Tolkien is held in the Church of St Anthony of Padua in Headington
* 1992 - The first part of the Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series) of The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is aired on BBC.

column2: Celeborn and Galadriel say farewell to Gandalf and the travellers. They intend to travel back to Lothlórien by way of the Redhorn Pass. Category:Datesfi:6. syyskuuta
